annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Prisons, industrial work programs, taxable income, see § 24-231.11.
Relocation assistance, taxation of relocation and housing assistance payments, see § 42-3403.05.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 14-213 made a technical change in item § 47-1806.09b.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Section 410(e) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: “Section 406(b), (d), (f), (l), (n), (o), (r), (v), (x)through (aa), (cc), (ff), (gg), (ll), (pp), (vv), (ww), (aaa), (ccc), (eee), and (ggg) shall apply as of January 1, 2001.”
